title: Death anniversary of renowned Qawwal Ghulam Farid Sabri marked
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 5 (APP): The death anniversary of renowned Qawwal Ghulam Farid Sabri marked on Wednesday (April 5).
Ghulam Farid Sabri along with his brother Maqbool Sabri were known as Sabri Brothers and earned much fame in Qawwali,a private news channel reported.
“Mera Koi Nahin Hai Tere Siwa”, “Bhardo Jholi Meri Ya Muhammad” and “Taajdar-e-Haram” are some of their most acclaimed qawwalis.
He was born in 1930 in Rohtak, India and died on this day in 1994 in Karachi.
